DOC.brief_summary: The investigator examine possible synergistic effect obstructive sleep apnea ( OSA ) type II diabetes mellitus ( DM ) vascular function perform two-part investigation : - A cross-sectional study compare subject OSA+DM , OSA , DM , healthy control . - A three-month randomized placebo-controlled trial continuous positive airway pressure ( CPAP ) subject OSA+DM .
DOC.brief_title: Vascular Impairment Type II Diabetes Mellitus With Co-morbid Obstructive Sleep Apnea
DOC.criteria: OSA subject : apneahypopnea index > =10 < 100 DM subject : clinical diagnosis DM glycated hemoglobin < 8.0 % Hematocrit < 32 Pregnancy Infectious/collagen vascular/hepatic renal/cardiopulmonary disease
